description: Fix two production issues discovered during test suite review: (1) Plan validator too strict - comprehensive plans scoring below 85, (2) Arrow function detection incomplete - functions without parentheses not detected in TypeScript/JavaScript
goal: Improve coderef workflow reliability by fixing validator scoring and expanding code analysis regex patterns
requirements: Fix plan validator to score comprehensive plans >= 85
Add regex patterns to detect arrow functions without parentheses
Ensure backward compatibility - no breaking changes
Add tests for new regex patterns
constraints: Do not change validation threshold - fix the validator logic instead
Maintain existing regex patterns - only add new ones
